text: "Sin Despertar" is a pop song performed by Chilean band Kudai. It was released as the first single of their debut album Vuelo. This single was also their first single as Kudai, after they gave up their old name band Ciao. This single was very successful in Chile and Argentina and later in the rest of Latin America, including Mexico. ==Music video== Kudai's music video for their first single ever "Sin Despertar", was filmed in Santiago, Chile and the location used in this music videos was in O'Higgins Park, Movistar Arena Santiago, the video was premiered on 24 June 2004 on MTV, and this was very successful on Los 10+ Pedidos and Top 20. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" !Chart (2004) !Position |- ! scope="row" |Chile Top 100 | style="text-align:center;"|2 |- |} == References == == External links == *Kudai Official Site *EMI Music Mexico Category:2004 singles Category:Kudai songs Category:2005 singles Category:2006 singles
